actions.text: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 185 (Roll no. 610).
Amendment (A015) offered by Ms. Blunt Rochester.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 185 (Roll no. 610).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Blunt Rochester amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 185 (Roll no. 610).

description: An amendment numbered 36 printed in Part B of House Report 118-261 to increase and decreases funding for the Community Development Fund to promote the identification and removal of barriers to affordable housing production and preservation.
purpose: Amendment increases and decreases funding, by $100 million, for the Community Development Fund to promote the identification and removal of barriers to affordable housing production and preservation.
